name: Gift to Humanity
description:
GTH is an indie RPG with a unique blend of strategy and action. Get through into the deep end of the GTH universe and protect the world from itself in this tactical top-down shooter.

You are a soldier, you find yourself broken and alone on a dangerous island in the not so distant feature. You have to fight for your survival against a wide variety of enemies and piece together the events leading to your current predicament.

  • Tactical: Use different skills to manipulate and turn a fight in your favor, with different strategies required for different enemies.

  • Create your own character: Fully customize your character, everything from skills to gear.

  • Skills: Learn new skills as you progress and play with a build that you enjoy.
